name: Bloom (itch) (Francesco Plinio D'Ignazio, GiacomoGD, NotJecker, Essojadojef, Daniele Ponticelli)
name_original: Bloom (itch) (Francesco Plinio D'Ignazio, GiacomoGD, NotJecker, Essojadojef, Daniele Ponticelli)
description:
Reach and connect as many tree buds as possible and grow the woods as far as you can in a natural 3D world!
Be the sprout of nature's growth!

Controls

WASD: move.

Left Mouse Button: connect to a nearby tree.

Credits

Game Design: Giacomo Morabito, Alessandro Perelli, JstPlink
Programming: Alessandro Perelli, JstPlink
3D Assets: JstPlink
2D Assets: Giovanni Genga
Audio - Daniele Ponticelli
